activities: Telenav provides a location-based service on mobile phones in Europe and employs European nationals.  In order to run the service, we receive voluntary information from our customers regarding their navigation experience.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We have committed to resolve complaints by European Union citizens relating to this policy (other than complaints regarding our handling of human resources data), which cannot be resolved directly with our company, through BBB EU Safe Harbor, a dispute resolution procedure administered by the Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.  We have committed to cooperate with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to resolve complaints regarding our handling of human resources data.
